hadiths.text: Narrated Hisham:`Urwa said, "The Prophet (ﷺ) entered Mecca in the year of the conquest of Mecca from the side of Kada' which is at the higher part of Mecca." `Urwa often entered from Kada' which was nearer of the two to his dwelling place

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ أَيْنَ يَخْرُجُ مِنْ مَكَّةَ
